## LatLngBounds.extend() method

Extends this bounds to contain the given point.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
extend(point: LatLng | LatLngLiteral): LatLngBounds;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  point | [LatLng](./google-places-autocomplete.latlng.md) \| [LatLngLiteral](./google-places-autocomplete.latlngliteral.md) |  |
